dc_description_s: point features showing towns   mountains on the routes north and south of the Tarim Basin, from Korla-Aksu and from Qarkilik-Khotan;  digitized from H.M. Prezhavalsky "Map of Central Asia"  1884 (first version)  CHGIS V4 also provides supplemental datasets, including points derived from Russian Historical Maps, and other features that have been developed or processed from publicly available sources for use with CHGIS layers. -- text from CHGIS v4 CD-ROM.
dc_subject_sm: towns and natural features, Tarim Basin, Xinjiang
